item.title: Add arbitrary records to Kube-DNS
item.description: Everything started the other day when I wanted to overwrite some DNS records inside my Kubernetes cluster, but I could not find a straightforward way to make that happens, or at least at the first glance. As they say, The best way to learn something is to play with it. So I took the matters into my own hands and decided to dig deeper and I found some really interesting stuff and I decided to write about it as my first blog in a Long, Long Time.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi There! I don’t know where you landed here from, But I’m glad that you reached my blog. I’ll be writing about my adventures and crazy tech experiments. Stay tuned! Thanks for reading!
